name: 2022 3rd International Conference on Computer Vision and Computational Intelligence
content: CVCI 2022 information: 1\. CVCI 2022 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter. 2\. Accepted papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and to be submitted and reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (CPCI). 3\. Prof. Chin-Chen Chang from Feng Chia University of Taiwan and Prof. Tatsuya Yamazaki from Niigata University of Japan will be the keynote speakers
